name: Will Glow the Wisp
description: You are trapped in a prison and only your skill and determination can help you escape. Will you prevail or will you be defeated? Will Glow the Wisp mixes Super Meat Boy, Geometry Wars and Enter the Gungeon, which results in an unforgettable and unique experience.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP SP2 or higher Processor: 1.80GHz Processor Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 650 (1024 MB Ram) DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 1 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or better Processor: Intel Core I5-4440 3,10 GHz Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 660 (2048 MB Ram) DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 2 GB available space
